message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $90 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but unfortunately $90 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $100 to make this deal work. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $95 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle and we can reach a satisfactory agreement.
